name: Vortex Hailing Stars
description:
Visual effects in the game may trigger seizures or other epileptic symptoms in some individuals. If you have a history of epilepsy or similar conditions, please play the game with caution or seek medical advice before doing so. For the best gaming experience, we recommend downloading the full version of the game.

Prepare for takeoff and get ready to explore the far reaches of space in our retro space arcade game!

The prototype game was developed at the student game jam https://vk.com/chsu_pro_it

https://vk.com/fallael  - game design, plot, code; 

https://vk.com/sindy_allen - music, SFX; 

https://vk.com/id322443016 - art, UI;

GDD (RU):

 https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yBPD9Li4gsD8aIcG6s4Ipx2GWF_XP5tCCD8o-HPGtuY/... 

Engine: Godot 3.5.2
